definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: And there he saw two fuzzy brown ears sticking up from under the cover.
sentences.chinese: 他看到床盖底下露出了两只毛茸茸的棕色耳朵。

sentences.english: Her eyes were vair, And never closed when I kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 在我吻她时，她从不闭上毛茸茸的双眼。

sentences.english: He had long, dark bangs and a suggestion of whiskers on his upper lip.
sentences.chinese: 他前额上的头发留得很长，上唇毛茸茸的。

sentences.english: Evidently a furry is someone who is an enthusiast of science fiction and fantasy where the heroes are animals.
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的人是当然是指科幻迷啦。

sentences.english: The fluffy, peachy -beige breast feather immediately suggested a mourning dove.
sentences.chinese: 这种毛茸茸的杏黄色胸羽马上让人想到了哀鸠。

sentences.english: I like the feel of this cloth; it has a warm woolly feel.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这块布给我的感觉，它摸上去毛茸茸的很暖和。

sentences.english: Their white, bushy bodies are cute, look like a tiny snowball.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的身体毛茸茸的，缩起来像是一个小雪球。

sentences.english: Furry ropes of poison sumac veined across the ground.
sentences.chinese: 毒漆树毛茸茸的藤条落得满地都是。

sentences.english: Four furry friends frolicking feverishly for fun.
sentences.chinese: 四只毛茸茸快乐嬉戏的的朋友，真好玩。

sentences.english: The jungle spread beneath him in a green velvet nap .
sentences.chinese: 丛林铺展在他的脚下，象一片绿丝绒那么毛茸茸的。

sentences.english: Alwin dressed as a hairy bear.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔文穿得像一头毛茸茸的熊。

sentences.english: Ah, the cute, cuddly furry Panda is a symbol of Pax Sinica.
sentences.chinese: 这个可爱，毛茸茸的熊猫就是中国研究院的标志。

sentences.english: Stubble side was brushy , that resulted from blunt sickle's reaping.
sentences.chinese: 茬口毛茸茸的，一看就知道是钝口的镰刀收割的。

sentences.english: A shaggy, oversize stuffed toy dog lay in front of the television set.
sentences.chinese: 一个毛茸茸的特大号玩具狗摆放在了电视机前。

sentences.english: He put one big hairy paw ahead of him.
sentences.chinese: 它把一只毛茸茸的脚爪伸到前面。

sentences.english: And you are woolly, you have a lovely thick coat.
sentences.chinese: 而且你也毛茸茸的，还有一件非常可爱的厚夹克。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
variant of 肉乎乎[rou4 hu1 hu1]
(pet name for a baby or small child)
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
